name: Lost Locale, Samsaran
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Races © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text:
This spell functions as lost passage (see below), except that it affects a larger area.

Lost locale can be made permanent with permanency at a cost of 90,000 gp.
area_zh: 每等级一个 1英里立方体（可变）
text_zh: 如同迷路术（Lost Passage），区别如上所述。此法术可以用90000gp来通过魔法恒定术（permanency）进行恒定。
